quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life—think of it, dream of it, live on that idea.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
quotes.author: Carol Burnett

quotes.text: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: There is nothing impossible to they who will try.
quotes.author: Alexander the Great

quotes.text: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you're the pilot.
quotes.author: Michael Altshuler

quotes.text: Life has no limitations, except the ones you make.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.text: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: If you are working on something that you really care about, you don't have to be pushed. The vision pulls you.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Experience is a hard teacher because she gives the test first, the lesson afterwards.
quotes.author: Vernon Law
